feed.title: Google Cloud: Memorystore for Redis
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Memorystore for Redis

entry.summary: A security fix has been implemented for Memorystore Redis to address CVE-2025-49844.
entry.title: Feature: Security fix for Memorystore Redis

entry.content: You can now use Cloud Logging to query and view maintenance logs for a Memorystore for Redis instance. For more information, see View maintenance logs. This feature is Generally Available.
entry.summary: View maintenance logs for your Memorystore for Redis instances using Cloud Logging.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud Logging for Memorystore for Redis Maintenance Logs
